title: Melted leeks with cashews
ingredients: ['20g margarine or olive oil', '1 leek, both white and green parts, cut into rounds', '1 carrot, minced', '1 handful chopped cashews', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '3 generous teaspoons ground cashews', '200ml warm water', '1 pinch ground cayenne pepper', '1 pinch paprika', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '1 teaspoon fresh or dried coriander', 'salt and ground black pepper', 'tamari soy sauce (optional)']
